item.title: Easiest Way to Prepare Any-night-of-the-week Bacon Turkey
item.description: Bacon Turkey Hello everybody, it’s Brad, welcome to our recipe page. Today, I will show you a way to prepare a special dish, bacon turkey. One of my favorites. This time, I am going to make it a little bit unique. This will be really delicious. Turkey bacon is a meat prepared from chopped, formed, cured, and smoked turkey, which is commonly marketed as a low-fat alternative to pork bacon.
